item.title: Bachelor Thesis: Using of Deep Gaussian Processes for Wind Energy Prediction
item.author: Rómulo García
item.description: Bachelor Thesis focused on testing Gaussian Processes and Deep Gaussian Processes to predict eolian energy production. Our experiments will take place in Sotavento, a wind mill complex located in the North of Spain. Wind energy is not constant, the wind mills don’t operate at certain speeds, the infrastructures require a lot of space… Therefore, these predictions are crucial as they can avoid power shortages, provide the basis for making decisions in power system planning and operation, between many other positive applications.

item.title: One Song A Day
item.author: Rómulo García
item.description: AI Song recommendation system based on user song reviews. Application was made using Android Studio (Java) and Firebase. A Python server-side application was made to manage data and populate the database. Google Play Link

item.title: Clicky Code
item.author: Rómulo García
item.description: Clicker video game with room decoration management. Game made with Unity(C#), Photoshop, Bosca Ceoil. Google Play Link

item.title: Fallen Dots
item.author: Rómulo García
item.description: Simple video game based on reflexes. Game made with Gdevelop. Google Play Link
